title: You and I
description: One spontaneous act a day keeps the boredom away...  If you liked Bared to You or Fifty Shades of Gray, you will enjoy this story!    Sophia finally moves into Jason's penthouse suite, but things quickly become routine and she fears that the excitement and mystery in their relationship is slowly disappearing.  Can Sophia introduce some excitement into her otherwise predictable relationship? And can Sophia make the cold penthouse Powers suite her home?   Note: This is the sixth instalment of the Billionaire Next Door series. Although each story can be read individually, you will understand the story better if read in sequence!   The other instalments of the Billionaire Next Door are: All Yours (Book 1) For You (Book 2) My Love (Book 3) Just Us (Book 4) With Me (Book 5) You and I (Book 6) All of Me (Book 7)   **This 10k word new adult erotic romance contains strong language and explicit scenes, including steamy hot sex between two characters. Adult readers only!***   keywords: new adult contemporary romance, romantic comedy, m/f, new adult sex
author: Violette Paradis
